alert-lost-pin.title: Lost your PIN?
alert-lost-pin.text: Please contact our support team at support@gigacharger.net to reset your PIN.

alert-permissions.text: Permission to access location was denied

profile.delete_alert: Please contact our support team at support@gigacharger.net to request deletion of your account

more.installRequestdesc: Request a station at your address. Also available in Romania and Greece.
more.forgotPassd: Please contact us for more information on how to recover your account.
more.updateSuccess: Your PIN has been updated successfully.
more.updateFail: Something went wrong, we couldn't change your PIN. Please try again.

commonNamespace.unHelp: Could be your phone number, e-mail address or arbitrary username.
commonNamespace.PINLength: The PIN code must be 4 to 6 digits long
commonNamespace.continueConfirm: Are you sure you want to continue?
commonNamespace.loginNotAllowed: Logins from this account have been restricted!
commonNamespace.enterAmountGTE0: Please specify an amout larger than 0
commonNamespace.enterAmountGTV: Please specify an amount larger than {{0}}
commonNamespace.name: Name
commonNamespace.registered: You have registered successfully, you can now log in!
commonNamespace.networxUserWrongPIN: Изглежда, че съществува клиент на Networx с това потребителско име, но ПИН кода не съвпада. Въведете правилния ПИН код или посочете друг потребител
commonNamespace.sessionNotOwned: You can not stop this charging session because you are not the one who started it.
commonNamespace.couldntGetLocation: Your location can not be determined!
commonNamespace.pleaseConnectToBegin: To begin charging, please make sure your vehicle is connected to the station!
commonNamespace.emergencyPressed: Изглежда, че аварийният бутон е натиснат. Моля уверете се, че бутона е в нормално състояние и опитайте отново.
commonNamespace.stationInMaintenance: Currently there seems to be maintenance going on and the station is not usable. Please excuse us for the inconvenience.
commonNamespace.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number
commonNamespace.powerSetting: Here you can set the maximum power for the station, if exceeded charging will be terminated.
commonNamespace.cantStartCharging: Can not start charging due to a technical problem
commonNamespace.cantStartChargingBanned: You are not allowed to start charging due to too many attempts, please try again at a later time.
commonNamespace.stationLostConnection: Lost connection with station, please wait a minute or two..
commonNamespace.privateLocationDesc: It is possible that a parking fee will be required.
commonNamespace.contactExplanation: Provide your phone number or e-mail, which can be used to restore access to your account in case you lose your PIN code.
commonNamespace.enterEnergyAmount: Please specify the amount you would like to charge.
commonNamespace.cantChargePrivate: You can not charge on this private station.
commonNamespace.rememberPIN: Do you want your PIN code to be saved to this device?

deposit.depositingDescr: Below you will find a list of available payment methods.
deposit.depositWithOffice: You can deposit funds at any Networx Bulgaria office.
deposit.paypalerror: An error has occurred, payment unsuccessful.
deposit.conversionClarification: All funds are converted to EUR. If you are using another currency that is only for convenience, all transfers are made in EUR at the daily rate of {{0}}
deposit.minAmount: This payment method requires a minimum deposit of {{0}}
deposit.minAmount2: This payment method has a minimum deposit requirement.

install.heading: Installation request
install.descr: We can install a charging station at a convenient spot free of charge!

withdraw.noEnough:
Unfortunately you do not cover the minimum withdrawal amount.
Please make sure you have more than the minimum required for withdrawal.
withdraw.useSlider: Use the slider to adjust the amount
withdraw.title: Receipt
withdraw.confirm: Your payout request has been received and will be processed in up to 5 work days.
withdraw.fail: An error has occurred, please try again!
withdraw.paypaldescr: E-mail address to use for a Paypal transaction.
withdraw.choosePayment: Please choose a payout method and provide the required information in order for us to complete the payment.
withdraw.waitingPayout: We are still processing your last request. Please wait for it to complete before submitting another one.
